mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_evaluate_goods( geval_orderid, geval_ordergoodsid, geval_goodsid, geval_goodsname, geval_goodsprice, geval_scores, geval_content, geval_image, geval_frommemberid, geval_frommembername, spec_info, create_time, is_del, geval_isanonymous, comment, geval_frommemberimg, logistics_score, service_score ) VALUE( #{orderId}, #{gevalOrderGoodsId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{gevalScore}, #{gevalContent}, #{gevalImage}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{specInfo}, #{createTime}, #{isDel}, #{gevalIsAnonymous}, #{comment}, #{userImg}, #{logisticsScore}, #{serviceScore} )
mapper.select: SELECT geval_id as gevalId, geval_orderid as orderId, geval_ordergoodsid as gevalOrderGoodsId, geval_goodsid as goodsId, geval_goodsname as goodsName, geval_goodsprice as goodsPrice, geval_scores as gevalScore, geval_content as gevalContent, geval_image as gevalImage, geval_frommemberid as userId, geval_frommembername as userName, spec_info as specInfo, create_time as createTime, is_del as isDel, geval_isanonymous as gevalIsAnonymous, comment, geval_frommemberimg as userImg, logistics_score as logisticsScore, service_score as serviceScore FROM shop_evaluate_goods WHERE geval_id=#{gevalId}

SELECT goods_id AS goodsId , goods_name AS goodsName, goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, goods_image AS goodsImage, store_id AS storeId, store_name AS storeName, spec_id AS specId, gc_id AS gcId, gc_big_id AS gcBigId, goods_description AS goodsDescription FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id=#{id} and is_del=0
SELECT spec_name FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id=#{goodsRuleId}

SELECT id, goods_id as goodsId, goods_rule_id as goodsRuleId, price, discount_price as discountPrice, activity_price as activityPrice, is_default as isDefault, remark, repertory, labelling, level, pid FROM t_s_goods_price WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND id=#{goodsRuleId}
SELECT id, goods_id AS goodsId, parameter_name AS parameterName, parameter_value AS parameterValue FROM t_s_goods_parameter WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
SELECT id, goods_id AS goodsId, name, context FROM t_s_packaging WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
select id, goods_id as goodsId, content, create_date as time from t_s_progress where goods_id=#{goodsId} and reserve_id=#{reserveId} order by create_date desc

SELECT s.id, s.goods_id AS goodsId, s.content, s.create_date AS time, s.pid, s.user_id as userId, u.user_icon AS userIcon, u.member_name AS nickName FROM t_s_ssht s INNER JOIN shop_member u ON s.user_id=u.user_id WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND pid=0 and reserve_id=#{reserveId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT s.id, s.goods_id AS goodsId, s.content, s.create_date AS time, s.pid, s.user_id as userId, u.user_icon AS userIcon, u.member_name AS nickName FROM t_s_ssht s INNER JOIN shop_member u ON s.user_id=u.user_id WHERE pid=#{id}
select id, hot_name as hotName, number from t_s_hot ORDER BY number DESC LIMIT 0,6
select id, hot_name as hotName, number from t_s_hot where hot_name=#{hotName}
mapper.insert: insert into t_s_hot ( hot_name, number ) value ( #{hotName}, #{number} )
mapper.select: SELECT gc_id AS gcId, gc_name AS gcName, gc_pic AS gcPic, gc_parent_id AS parentId FROM shop_goods_class WHERE gc_show=1 ORDER BY gc_sort ASC

SELECT g.goods_id AS goodsId, g.goods_name AS goodsName, g.goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, g.goods_image AS goodsImage, g.goods_description AS goodsDescription, g.store_id AS storeId, g.store_name AS storeName, g.spec_id AS specId , g.gc_id AS gcId, g.gc_big_id AS gcBigId FROM shop_goods g INNER JOIN shop_goods_spec gs ON g.goods_id=gs.goods_id AND gs.spec_isopen=1 WHERE goods_show=1 and g.is_del=0
AND gc_id=#{gcId}
AND gc_big_id=#{gcId}
AND g.goods_name LIKE concat('%',#{goodsName},'%')
GROUP BY gs.goods_id
ORDER BY g.salenum DESC, g.goods_store_price ASC
ORDER BY g.create_time DESC
ORDER BY g.salenum DESC
ORDER BY gs.spec_goods_price asc
ORDER BY gs.spec_goods_price desc
limit #{page},#{row}
SELECT spec_goods_price, spec_goods_vip_price, spec_goods_purchase_price, commission FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id = #{specId}
SELECT spec_goods_price AS gprice, spec_salenum AS hasBeen FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id = #{specId}

SELECT recommend_id AS recommendId, recommend_name AS recommendInfo, show_num AS showNum, is_reserve AS isReserve, is_activity AS isActivity, is_publish AS isPublish, gc_big_id AS gcBigId , gc_big_name AS gcBigName , recomm_img AS recommImg, cover_img AS coverImg , title_color AS titleColor FROM shop_goods_recommend WHERE recommend_use=0 AND show_site=1 ORDER BY sort asc

SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, goods_name AS goodsName, goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, goods_image AS goodsImage, goods_description AS goodsDescription, is_popularize, store_id AS storeId, store_name AS storeName, spec_id AS specId FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_show=1 and is_del=0 AND goods_id IN (SELECT goods_id FROM shop_gc_recommend WHERE gc_big_id=#{gcBigId} AND is_start=1 AND recommend_id = #{recommendId}) LIMIT 0,#{showNum}

SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, goods_name AS goodsName, goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, goods_image AS goodsImage, goods_description AS goodsDescription, store_id AS storeId, store_name AS storeName, spec_id AS specId, gc_id AS gcId, gc_big_id as gcBigId FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} and goods_show=1 and is_del=0

SELECT n.goods_id AS goodsId, n.spec_name AS specName, n.spec_id AS specId, g.goods_name AS goodsName, g.goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, g.goods_description AS goodsDescription, g.store_id AS storeId, g.store_name AS storeName, g.goods_image AS showImg FROM shop_new_goods n INNER JOIN shop_goods g ON n.goods_id=g.goods_id AND g.goods_show=1 and g.is_del=0 WHERE type=1 AND is_start=1 ORDER BY sort

SELECT goods_id AS goodsId, goods_name AS goodsName, goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, goods_image AS goodsImage, goods_description AS goodsDescription, store_id AS storeId, store_name AS storeName, spec_id AS specId, gc_id AS gcId, gc_name AS gcName, goods_body AS goodsBody, goods_image_more AS goodsImageMore, gc_big_id AS gcBigId, gc_big_name AS gcBigName , transport_id AS transportId, full_free_mail AS fullFreeMail, is_share as isShare FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id =#{goodsId} AND goods_show=1 and is_del=0

SELECT spec_name AS specName, spec_goods_price AS specGoodsPrice, spec_goods_vip_price as specGoodsVipPrice, spec_goods_purchase_price as specGoodsPurchasePrice, commission, spec_goods_storage AS specGoodsStorage, spec_salenum AS specSalenum, spec_goods_color AS specGoodsColor, spec_goods_spec AS specGoodsSpec , goods_spec_id AS specGoodsId, commission As commission FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE spec_isopen=1 AND goods_id=#{goodsId}

SELECT ga.goods_spec_id AS goodsSpecId, ga.activity_price AS activityPrice, ga.activity_repertory AS activityRepertory, ga.discount_price AS discountPrice, ga.spec_price AS specPrice, ga.remark AS remark , ga.reserve_one_pay_price AS onePayPrice, ga.pledge_price AS pledgePrice, ga.reserve_two_pay_price AS twoPayPrice, ga.has_been AS hasBeen, ga.virtual, a.reserve_pay_type AS reservePayType, a.activity_start_time AS actStartTime, a.activity_end_time AS actEndTime , a.reserve_two_start_time AS towStartTime, a.reserve_two_end_time AS towEndTime , a.predict_time AS predictTime , a.reserve_flow AS reserveFlow , a.act_id AS actId , a.limit_number as limitNumber FROM ( SELECT limit_number,reserve_flow,predict_time,act_id,reserve_pay_type,activity_start_time,activity_end_time,reserve_two_start_time,reserve_two_end_time FROM shop_goods_activity WHERE act_state=2 AND activity_type=#{actType}) a INNER JOIN shop_goods_act_price ga ON a.act_id=ga.act_id AND goods_id=#{goodsId} AND is_start=1

SELECT sgc.compl_id AS complId, sgc.goods_id AS goodsId, sgc.compl_goods_id AS complGoodsId, sgc.start_time AS startTime, sgc.end_time AS endTime, sgc.compl_spec_id AS complSpecId, sgc.compl_spec_name AS complSpecName, sgc.compl_number AS complNumber, sgc.compl_name AS complName, sg.goods_image as complImage FROM shop_goods_compl sgc,shop_goods sg WHERE sgc.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND sgc.is_start=1 AND sg.goods_id=sgc.goods_id and sg.goods_show='1' AND sg.is_del=0

SELECT sgs.spec_goods_storage AS repertory, sgs.spec_salenum AS hasBeen, sgs.spec_goods_price AS activityPrice , sgs.spec_name AS specName, sgs.spec_goods_spec AS specInfo, sgs.goods_spec_id, sgs.goods_id, sg.is_coupon, sg.is_points, sg.is_red_envelope, sgs.spec_goods_purchase_price, sgs.spec_goods_vip_price FROM shop_goods_spec sgs INNER JOIN shop_goods sg ON sgs.goods_id=sg.goods_id AND sg.goods_show=1 AND sg.is_del=0 WHERE sgs.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND sgs.goods_spec_id=#{specId} AND sgs.spec_isopen=1

SELECT ga.goods_id AS goodsId, ga.goods_spec_id AS goodsSpecId, ga.activity_price AS activityPrice, ga.activity_repertory AS activityRepertory, ga.discount_price AS discountPrice, ga.spec_price AS specPrice, ga.remark AS remark , ga.reserve_one_pay_price AS onePayPrice, ga.pledge_price AS pledgePrice, ga.reserve_two_pay_price AS twoPayPrice, ga.has_been AS hasBeen, ga.virtual , a.act_state AS actState, a.reserve_pay_type AS reservePayType, a.activity_start_time AS actStartTime, a.activity_end_time AS actEndTime , a.reserve_two_start_time AS towStartTime, a.reserve_two_end_time AS towEndTime , a.act_id AS actId FROM ( SELECT act_state,act_id,reserve_pay_type,activity_start_time,activity_end_time,reserve_two_start_time,reserve_two_end_time FROM shop_goods_activity WHERE act_state=2 AND activity_type=#{activityType}) a INNER JOIN shop_goods_act_price ga ON a.act_id=ga.act_id
SELECT goods_name as goodsName, goods_image as goodsImage , goods_description AS goodsDescription FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} and is_del=0

SELECT ga.goods_spec_id AS goodsSpecId, ga.activity_price AS activityPrice, ga.activity_repertory AS activityRepertory, ga.discount_price AS discountPrice, ga.spec_price AS specPrice, ga.remark AS remark , ga.has_been AS hasBeen FROM shop_goods_act_price ga WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND goods_spec_id=#{specId} AND is_start=1 AND act_id IN (SELECT act_id FROM shop_goods_activity WHERE act_state=2 AND activity_type=2 )

SELECT gc.activity_start_time AS startTime, gc.activity_end_time AS endTime, gc.limit_number AS limitNumber, gap.activity_repertory AS repertory, gap.has_been AS hasBeen , gap.activity_price AS activityPrice, gap.is_coupon, gap.is_points, gap.is_red_envelope FROM shop_goods_act_price gap INNER JOIN shop_goods_activity gc ON gap.act_id=gc.act_id AND gc.activity_type=2 AND gc.act_state=2 WHERE gap.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND gap.goods_spec_id=#{specId} AND gap.is_start=1

SELECT gc.activity_start_time AS startTime, gc.activity_end_time AS endTime, gc.limit_number AS limitNumber, gap.activity_repertory AS repertory, gap.has_been AS hasBeen , gap.activity_price AS activityPrice , gc.reserve_pay_type AS reserveType , gap.reserve_one_pay_price AS onePayPrice , gap.pledge_price AS pledgePrice , gap.reserve_two_pay_price AS twoPayPrice , gap.act_price_id AS actPriceId , gc.act_id, gc.activity_type, gap.goods_id, gap.goods_spec_id, gap.is_coupon, gap.is_points, gap.is_red_envelope FROM shop_goods_act_price gap INNER JOIN shop_goods_activity gc ON gap.act_id=gc.act_id AND gc.activity_type=#{actType} AND gc.act_state=2 INNER JOIN shop_goods sg ON gap.goods_id=sg.goods_id AND sg.is_del=0 and sg.goods_show=1 WHERE gap.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND gap.goods_spec_id=#{goodsSpecId} AND gap.is_start=1
SELECT goods_image AS goodsImage, gc_id AS gcId, goods_name AS goodsName, goods_description as goodsTitle, gc_big_id AS gcBigId FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id =#{complGoodsId} and is_del=0
SELECT gc_id AS gcId, gc_name AS gcName, gc_pic AS gcPic, gc_parent_id AS parentId FROM shop_goods_class WHERE gc_show=1 AND is_recommend =1 and gc_parent_id!=0 and is_del=0
SELECT gc_id AS gcId, gc_name AS gcName, gc_pic AS gcPic , gc_parent_id AS parentId FROM shop_goods_class WHERE gc_show=1 AND gc_id=#{parentId} and is_del=0
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_goods SET salenum=#{newSalenum} WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(salenum,0) FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
SELECT transport_id FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
SELECT id , snum, sprice, xnum, xprice , shipping_type AS shippingType FROM shop_transport_extend WHERE transport_id =#{transportId} AND area_name LIKE concat('%',#{cityName},'%')
SELECT count(id) FROM shop_transport_activity WHERE start_time < #{time} AND end_time > #{time} AND is_open=2 AND ( free_freight_rule < #{freAm} OR free_freight_rule = #{freAm} )

SELECT gc.activity_start_time AS startTime, gc.activity_end_time AS endTime, gc.limit_number AS limitNumber, gap.activity_repertory AS repertory, gap.has_been AS hasBeen , gap.activity_price AS activityPrice , gc.reserve_pay_type AS reserveType , gap.reserve_one_pay_price AS onePayPrice , gap.pledge_price AS pledgePrice , gap.reserve_two_pay_price AS twoPayPrice , gap.act_price_id AS actPriceId , gc.act_id AS actId , gc.activity_type AS activityType FROM shop_goods_act_price gap INNER JOIN shop_goods_activity gc ON gap.act_id=gc.act_id AND gc.act_state=2 AND gc.activity_start_time < #{time} AND gc.activity_end_time > #{time} WHERE gap.goods_id=#{goodsId} AND gap.goods_spec_id=#{goodsSpecId} AND gap.is_start=1

SELECT s.id, s.goods_id AS goodsId, s.content, s.create_date AS time, s.pid, s.user_id as userId, u.user_icon AS userIcon, u.member_name AS nickName FROM t_s_ssht s INNER JOIN shop_member u ON s.user_id=u.user_id WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId} AND pid=0 and reserve_id=#{actId} ORDER BY create_date desc LIMIT #{start},#{rows}
SELECT goods_image AS goodsImage, gc_id AS gcId, goods_name AS goodsName, goods_description as goodsTitle, gc_big_id AS gcBigId FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id =#{complGoodsId} and is_del=0
SELECT * FROM shop_goods_class WHERE gc_parent_id=#{0} and is_del=0

SELECT ga.activity_start_time AS actStartTime, ga.activity_end_time AS actEndTime, ga.reserve_two_start_time AS towStartTime, ga.reserve_two_end_time AS towEndTime , ga.predict_time as predictTime FROM shop_goods_activity ga WHERE act_id=#{reserveId}
SELECT ap_id AS apId, res_url AS resUrl FROM shop_adv WHERE ap_id IN(18,19)
SELECT spec_goods_spec FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id=#{goodsSpecId}

SELECT goods_spec_id as specGoodsId, goods_id as goodsId, spec_name AS specName, spec_goods_price AS specGoodsPrice, spec_goods_storage as specGoodsStorage, spec_salenum AS specSalenum, spec_goods_color as specGoodsColor, spec_goods_serial as specGoodsSerial, spec_goods_spec as specGoodsSpec, spec_isopen as specIsopen, weight, volume, commission FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id=#{specId}

SELECT te.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(te.sprice) AS sprice, MAX(te.xprice) AS xprice, te.shipping_type, te.area_name FROM shop_cart c JOIN shop_goods g ON c.goods_id = g.goods_id JOIN shop_transport_extend te ON g.transport_id = te.transport_id AND te.area_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') WHERE c.cart_id IN (#{f})
AND c.g_type=2
GROUP BY te.shipping_type, te.area_name ) g INNER JOIN shop_transport_extend te ON g.sprice = te.sprice AND g.xprice = te.xprice AND g.shipping_type = te.shipping_type AND g.area_name = te.area_name limit 1

SELECT g.goods_id AS goodsId, g.goods_name AS goodsName, g.goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, g.goods_image AS goodsImage, g.goods_description AS goodsDescription, g.store_id AS storeId, g.store_name AS storeName, g.spec_id AS specId , g.gc_id AS gcId, g.gc_big_id AS gcBigId FROM shop_recommend sr inner join shop_goods g on sr.goods_id=g.goods_id WHERE sr.type=#{type} and g.goods_show=1 AND g.is_del=0 AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM shop_goods_spec gs WHERE gs. goods_id =g.goods_id AND gs.spec_isopen=1) order by sr.sort

SELECT g.goods_id AS goodsId, g.goods_name AS goodsName, g.goods_subtitle AS goodsSubtitle, g.goods_image AS goodsImage, g.goods_description AS goodsDescription, g.store_id AS storeId, g.store_name AS storeName, g.spec_id AS specId , g.gc_id AS gcId, g.gc_big_id AS gcBigId FROM shop_recommend sr inner join shop_goods g on sr.goods_id=g.goods_id WHERE sr.type=#{type} and g.goods_show=1 AND g.is_del=0 AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM shop_goods_spec gs WHERE gs. goods_id =g.goods_id AND gs.spec_isopen=1) order by sr.sort limit #{page},#{rows}

SELECT goods_id, goods_name, goods_description AS goodsDescription, store_id AS storeId, store_name AS storeName, spec_id AS specId, gc_id AS gcId, gc_name AS gcName, goods_body AS goodsBody, goods_image_more AS goodsImageMore, gc_big_id AS gcBigId, gc_big_name AS gcBigName , transport_id AS transportId, full_free_mail AS fullFreeMail, is_coupon as isCoupon, services FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_id =#{goodsId} AND goods_show=1 and is_del=0
SELECT * FROM shop_goods_spec WHERE goods_spec_id=#{goodsSpecId} and goods_id=#{goodsId}
